iaik.pkcs.pkcs12

Class KeyBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pkcs.pkcs12.Attributes
      • iaik.pkcs.pkcs12.SafeBag
        • iaik.pkcs.pkcs12.KeyBag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ASN1Type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PKCS8ShroudedKeyBag

    public class KeyBag
extends SafeBag
    This class contains a private key and any associated attributes.
    Version:
    File Revision 9
    See Also:
    SafeBag, Attributes
